comments.body:
how about being more precise?
```suggestion
cryptography < 3.2 ; python_version >= '2.7' and 'freebsd' in sys_platform  # cryptography 3.2 drops support for OpenSSL 1.0.2 which some of our CI hosts (FreeBSD) still use
```
Does that work (or at least not cause errors) back to pip 7.1?
I discussed with mattclay, we would need it to work back to 7.1.
